snippet: The audacious British artist, who has a solo show opening tomorrow at the Museum of Contemporary Art North Miami, has adopted South Florida as a home away from home. Here, she shares a few favorite destinations.
abstract: The audacious British artist, who has a solo show opening tomorrow at the Museum of Contemporary Art North Miami, has adopted South Florida as a home away from home. Here, she shares a few favorite destinations.

headline.main: Why Tracey Emin Is in a Miami State of Mind
